title: 开始写博客
content: 测试+写第一篇开始写吧，就这样 Evert moment think steadily as a Roman and a man to do what thou hast in hand with perfect and simple dignity, and feeling if affection, and freedom, and justice; and to give thyself relief from all other thoughts. And thou wilt give thyself relief, if thou do every act of thy life as if it were the last, laying aside all carelessness and passionate and discontent with the portion which has been given to thee. Thou to live a life which flows in quiet, and is like the existence of the gods; for the gods on their part will require nothing more from him who observes these things. [Document] technique or skill from internet document page [Follow] follow the video from some channel I subscribe [Note] personal note from build some utils or project, deal some problem [Book] knowledge from book reading and write note []

title: Hello World
content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
